name: Bomberman Multiplayer Fan Game
description:
A fan game of the Bomberman series that has full online multiplayer made in Construct 3. All the sprites and art assets are from the original Bomberman games, and the music is from tricksntraps. Link here: https://opengameart.org/content/free-music-pack. The game supports at most 4 people per room, and has full online multiplayer. Play against your friends and try to achieve the highest kill count with the least amount of deaths, and hold the P key to see the leaderboard. 

Hope you enjoy this game more online multiplayer games coming soon!
